effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
